channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA

  • Description: SequenceEvent: found laying on its side leaking. box placed upright in bucket and taken to QA cage for inspection. DescribePack: 1 side of box wet and formed a hole where the leaking bottle is located. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed box into bucket upright and taken to QA cage for inspection.

item.title: Report E-2023090052
item.description:
Report E-2023090052

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-07T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: SEEKONK
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On August 23, 2023, one (1) 15-gallon drum of UN3267 was damaged due to a faulty skid and released approximately two (2) gallons of product to the trailer interior and pavement underneath the trailer. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Boston Green Company BCG to remediate the impacted site. BCG personnel deployed neutralizing, granular absorbents to the corrosive-liquid impacted trailer and pavement and swept them in with hand tools. Crews also used hand tools to cut up the impacted pallet. BCG personnel proceeded to use a Hudson sprayer to wash down the trailer and pavement and deployed another layer of absorbents to ensure no product or product-rinseate remained at the site. All spent absorbents, the cut-up pallet, and miscellaneous cleanup debris were collected and containerized into two (2) 55-gallon poly drums.

item.title: Report X-2023080991
item.description:
Report X-2023080991

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND AS AFFECTED BY A SPILL. THE OUTER CARTON WAS CONTAMINATED FROM ANOTHER PACKAGE. WHEN OPENED DURING INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED THE PACKAGE CONTAINED 6 PROPANE CANNISTERS. THE OUTER CARTON CONTAINED NO IDENTIFICATION OF A HAZARDOUS MATERIAL. HAZMAT HELP DESK WAS CALLED.
